html:
4.9.17  9:44 am   Is tonight the Big Night? As in, the new Bill Wurtz video release night?

     that would be nice, but the video is unfinished. i would prefer to release it when it is finished
4.9.17  8:54 am   How long have you been playing piano?

4.9.17  7:23 am   Will the new video be out in the next 4 days, 7 hours, 23 minutes, 49 seconds and 3 milliseconds?

     that would be nice

4.9.17  7:20 am   why people laugh when i wear socks that doesn't match?

     i guess they are interpreting it as comedy
4.9.17  7:15 am   how to get out of a depression?
4.9.17  7:14 am   how do i know i am real?
4.9.17  7:13 am   can plants feel?

4.9.17  6:30 am   Will you run for U.S presidency in 2020 and win?

     i don't think that's a good use of my time

4.9.17  6:03 am   What's left to do after the score?

     mixing, general troubleshooting, year labels, etc, also a lot of jingle vocals

4.9.17  5:42 am   bill, judging from the previous questions, you dont value clarity

     i do, but i respect your opinion

4.9.17  5:27 am   it must have been strange working on a deadline in december when there was still at leaast 4 months left of work to do after that

     pretending it was possible gave me a turbo charge in early november. the bad news is it is potentially more work afterwards to pick up the pieces and clean up the mess from the fast/sloppy work, but i still think i came out ahead

4.9.17  5:24 am   theory: 19:21 is the total length of the video and by saying that's how far you are on the score you mean you've finished that part

     2 seconds left

     and are now finishing the final bits, and the video will be out monday or tuesday

     i think there is still a lot more work than that

4.9.17  5:15 am   did you finish the score?

     almost

4.9.17  4:06 am   Am I your dad?

     no

4.9.17  3:53 am   What time of day do you think would be the most affecting time to release you latest piece? Possibly in the dead of night so your fans wake up to a Christmas-like morning surprise? Maybe late afternoon so that it hits just in time to pick up steam for prime time? Just thoughts that I was thoughting.

     i have viewers all across different time zones, but i might aim for about 9pm UTC

4.9.17  3:12 am   you say that meat are your favourite type of balls,

     well no, i wrote that, in a piece of fiction

     but do you like other types of balls such as disco, popcorn, cheese, bouncy, etc.?

4.9.17  2:24 am   how do i breathe

     i'm not sure

4.9.17  1:43 am   Hey you're a pretty cool music maker. How do you do it?

     i don't know

4.9.17  12:56 am   What time is it?

      it was 4:56 am UTC at the time you asked this, it is 6:00 am UTC at the time I am answering it, and probably a different, later time as you are reading it

4.9.17  12:19 am   Why do you switch shirts with every instrument?

     well i'm already the same person playing every instrument, so it's good to show at least a little effort in making them different, in the video

4.9.17  12:17 am   Do you ever feel like you HAVE to work because of the expectations people seem to have for you?

     no

     Or are you afraid of backlash on videos you work hard on simply because they "aren't as good/aren't like History of Japan"?

     i don't know if history of japan is really all that good, compared to other stuff i could do. it is just the only thing i have done so far that has significant length, and also tackles a non-fictional storyline. it was my first attempt. a trial run, if you will. so the fact that that one was well received is good news, and a good sign for the future. i am not sure if that answers your question

      I wonder this about a lot of creators and am eager to see how you feel about these things.
4.8.17  11:38 pm   can you give me the link to the anagrams page please

4.8.17  11:37 pm   how are you so funny?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

4.8.17  10:57 pm   any tips on not being afraid of the dark

     spend more time in the dark

4.8.17  10:57 pm   What's your favorite Bible scripture?

     the one where jesus gets offered a sweet record deal but turns it down

4.8.17  10:54 pm   do you think that asking an artist to explain the meaning behind their work is wack

     well, it seems like artists are trying deeply to explain and express things IN their work, and with their work. so some artists may or may not be thrilled to do additional explaining on top of that

4.8.17  10:39 pm   Was it yesterday?

     i was going to say yes, but now that i think about it, i realize it never was

4.8.17  10:29 pm   People tell me the best way to get better at drawing is to draw more, and I respect that. But when I start to draw I get disheartened by how shitty the drawing is and just stop halfway through. How do you stop this feeling? I really want to draw well because I have 20000 fully-formed universes, storylines and characters in my mind that I cannot express with words alone, and I'm afraid that I'll forget them if they don't appear.

     if drawing is right for you, then you will not let anything stand in your way. if it is not right for you, then you may be inclined to let things stand in your way. i am not sure if that answers your question

4.8.17  10:13 pm   Will you do Jazz Moana (How Far I'll Go)?

     that seems like a good idea. i don't normally have time to catch up on the latest disney films but that sounds like a good idea

4.8.17  9:45 pm   How do you relax?

     breathe, and think about the ground

4.8.17  9:41 pm   I always get really nervous when playing instruments in front of other people. Any tips for getting over this fear?

     do it more

4.8.17  9:35 pm   Can u get pregante?

     i've never tried

4.8.17  9:25 pm   are you good at some stuff

     yes

4.8.17  9:19 pm   Given a Condition that is itself a contradiction, would all Conclusions drawn from that condition be correct? If so, can you give me an example?

     i would think they would be incorrect

4.8.17  9:00 pm   how do you do something for real and get it right if you've never practiced or done it or before?

     for things with a strict right or wrong answer, and severe consequence for getting it 'wrong', then i suppose practice would be appropriate

4.8.17  8:53 pm   are ghosts real

     i'm not sure

4.8.17  8:52 pm   if you were an animal, and not a human, which would you be?

     i would have to consult with the author of that particilar fictional situation
4.8.17  8:14 pm   Do y0u answer every question you get?

4.8.17  7:35 pm   how is your mental stability

     nice, very good, etc
4.8.17  7:16 pm   £ What is your favourite letter?

4.8.17  6:35 pm   do you particularly enjoy 5AM ?

     oh hell yeah

      if so why ?

     the world feels brand new

4.8.17  6:13 pm   How to make a sandwich

     i'm not sure
4.8.17  5:46 pm   Can you just post this with no answer, just for fun? Thanks

4.8.17  5:39 pm   hey! you say you never watch you videos after they are done... but you had to rewatch at least some of history of japan in order to make annotations, right

     not really i just went straight to the parts to add the things

4.8.17  5:28 pm   What do you think of constructed languages?

     hardly anyone speaks a constructed language as a primary language. except computers

4.8.17  5:24 pm   You said if you're not motivated to do something, then you probably shouldn't do it. What if that something is studying for exams?

     it depends on the consequences of failing

4.8.17  5:12 pm   if you don't consider history of japan / hotewig to be comedy,

     i don't think i said that

     then what would you consider them to be?

     the best part about making stuff is you don't have to decide that. you can still make the stuff anyway

      what kind of stuff would you consider comedy?

     i'm not interested in making those kinds of considerations

4.8.17  4:51 pm   did you ever learn to pronounce kościuszko properly

     i have always pronounced it the way the train lady pronounces it, which is almost identical to the way polish people pronounce it, which i assume is the correct way, because the word is of polish origin. i'm not sure if that answers your question
4.8.17  4:32 pm   MEMES

4.8.17  3:55 pm   what time are you at the score

     19:21
